class.name: IllegalPathStateException
class.javadoc: The IllegalPathStateException represents an exception that is thrown if an operation is performed on a path that is in an illegal state with respect to the particular operation being performed, such as appending a path segment to a {@link GeneralPath} without an initial moveto.
Constructs an IllegalPathStateException with no detail message. 1.2
Constructs an IllegalPathStateException with the specified detail message. s the detail message 1.2
